name: Jason Morris
text: Good customer service very helpful

name: GARY Busby
text: Great place

name: Elysia Bailey
text: Great place. Friendly people. Love hopping here.

name: Michael Bullock
text: Found everything I needed

name: Jim Mounier
text: Would  not do business with these people  they expected a offer from marketplace  on a building. Tried calling them  all morning  drove up from  Birmingham  get there  they already sold it  we really was not upset at that   They we’re just rude  when we asked about  it  just short and hateful   We will do business somewhere else

resp.text:
Sir, we are sorry that you feel we run a bad business. The ad said first come, first serve. So yes, we did say that the first one to come in with the deposit, got it. Our business hours are posted on Facebook and Google. The only days we are not in the office is on Saturday afternoon/evening to Sunday. We do try to spend those days with family and "leave work, at work". We are sorry this has upset you enough to leave a bad review, but we are more than happy to keep an eye out for another repo for you in the future.  Please understand that if we held everything for someone that simply asked how to pay a deposit, we wouldn't sell much, because people do not always show up when they say they will. Again, if you would like us to be on the look out for another repo, please let us know.

Have a great day!

name: Sue Doss
text: Haley is awesome

name: RONALD LEVERETT
text: Nice place

name: Johnnie Simpson
text: I needed an estimate for my insurance and it just took a few minutes.

name: Toby Philpot
text: Very helpful good people

name: Marvin Pitts
text: Good folks quick to handle the problem or situation.

name: Establish Knowledge
text: Drivers this is not an easy place to back into. If you look at Google it will not show a dock because they have a portable dock. Driver you will have to back into the gate to bump the dock.

name: George Perze
text: Very helpful.

name: ALBERT CUSSON
text:
I will try to give the most honest review that I can. First, they did not make the custom tarp that we requested (specifically we asked for a special front and rear flap and did not get it). They did not give us what we asked for, they gave us what they wanted to give us. This has created many problems with the loads we haul.
Second. We realize that there is no tarp that is puncture proof, so we state that, in comparison to other traps we have had in the past, the material of these tarps is not performing nearly as well. They do not hold up as one would reasonably expect when exposing them to standard use. Further, we have one area where the simple vibration of the straps, melted the tarp.
Third. The strapping has ripped out in several areas. The sewing that our tarps got, was clearly below industry. This has rendered the tarps useless in areas we can no longer control with bungie cords.
Lastly, the font that they used to put our company logo on the tarps, is so cheap and so awful, you can't hardly read our company name.
That said, the people we worked with were kind and the tarps were completed on time. The price was fair....but given the issues we have experienced, we have decided to give the tarps away (I don't feel I can charge anyone else for these tarps) and purchase a new set. We are in to these tarps about 2 years and they have only been used to tarp about
25 -30 loads.
I cannot recommend this companies tarps at this time.

name: Charles Andrews
text: Good place for tarp work!

name: James Clark
text:
DO NOT COME HERE!

This business is not here to provide you a service. They are only concerned with their own profits, even at the cost of keeping customers satisfied.

They charged me twice as much as Dothan Canvas for the exact same thing. Furthermore, even after explaining that I was buying glue for a Boy Scout project, they still charged me retail price.  When I called earlier to get a price for canvas, I was treated like I was an inconvenience to them.

I will never come here again, and if anyone asks me, I will tell them to keep clear of this business.

name: hlg1978
text: The reviews for this company are not correct on here.  I know for a fact that this company is the most honest and has the best quality.

name: Kim Gray
text: Great quality and delivery. Set up how i want it not where they wanted it.

resp.text: Oh Good I am so glad you liked it. Thank You!

name: Bobbie Daniel
text: Stopped by to browse & the lady in the office was very nice & showed me what I was thinking of buying. It was allot more spacious than I'd imagined & financing is reasonable so will definitely consider a purchase in the near future.

resp.text: Thank you

name: D Hofstadter
text: We had a 8 x 12 storage unit for years. Not we have a much larger building in the back yard that matches our house and we own it! so... Over all we are very excited and pleased with 10k Barns. If we had to do it over again we would still use 10K Barns. Quality build, delivery, setup, level, and friendly. So Yea, we are very pleased!

resp.text: Thank You!

name: Ron Furgason
text: We've ordered 2 of these buildings for each of our rental properties. Very very impressed with the workmanship as well as the overall aesthetics. We will be using 10k for our next property storage building.

resp.text: Thank You!

name: John Ryan
text: Its alot bigger than we thought!! We love it!

resp.text: Thank you for the stars John. Hope you enjoy your new Man Cave! o.O

name: LinEvBlaine
text: Best prices, selection, setup!!

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate you!

name: Evelyn Bates
text: Everything I needed cheaper than a smaller chain and some really great deals

name: Bobbie King
text: Always have what I need and always a pleasure!

name: Debra Vickers
text: good service

name: Benny Manzanilla
text: The service is terrible at the one on schillinger road can't find nothing can't find someone to assist you what you looking for

name: Sonia S
text: After spending thousands of dollars for countertops, carpet, backsplash, vinyl siding............they sold me a cracked kitchen sink........I had to return it............they gave me credit for the returned sink...........but forgot to charge me for the new sink that the crew had to bring from another store.  The manager Gail hounded me about coming in to have the $199 sink charged to my Home Depot account.  She even threatened to cancel the installation of my backsplash that was scheduled for the next day.  Needless to say........I did go in and pay for the sink.  Very unprofessional.............considering I have been a loyal customer for years.

name: Wade Parnell
text: Most helpful.

name: mike piliponis
text: Quick service

name: ashley Moran
text: These guys are awesome! They have great attitudes and are very easy to work with. I bought a car from them recently and they worked with me in every way possible. I highly recommend Austin & Tommy (the owners). I wouldn't go anywhere else to buy a vehicle, they truly care about their customers. LOVE them!!!!

name: Jodie McKinley
text: As much as I would like to leave more stars for the quick and efficient buying of a truck from Kip, I have to say that TNT sold us a lemon. The truck we bought in November has something wrong with it every week which means my husband is throwing money at parts instead of trying to make the payment. They sold us an expensive extended warranty that we knew nothing about and when the air conditioner went out in the truck, we were told the warranty covers powertrain ONLY. Save time and money and shop elsewhere, There are plenty more reputable dealers around that won't sell you a piece of junk.

name: Clint Chance
text: They welcomed us in with open arms, were more than accommodating. Staff was friendly, however pre-occupied. We bought our vehicle in September. The owner was willing to pay for faulty sensors on the vehicle found at time of purchase. The only major complaint that I have is to Make sure that they complete ALL the paperwork before you leave to help you avoid frequent subsequent trips to sign your name.

name: Kylee Hovel
text: Absolutely the best in the business!!! We got an excellent deal on our Acadia.  It's fully loaded, excellent condition and we couldn't be happier.  Highly recommended!!

name: Michael Goins
text: I went to 2 of Mobile's highest rated car detailers with my car due to me having sap dried on my paint.  WIth no luck at either of these places I contacted TNT and took the car in and in no time my car was back to looking brand new again!!  I refer this place to anyone now who is looking for someone to detail their vehicle..  Staff could not have been nicer and accommodating!!

name: Daniel Woods
text: The worse car lot ever they payments is very expensive they cars are not worth it. They screwed me an my family over on a truck that we had purchased they signed an agreement saying that they was gone fix it in they didnt. Than they told me not to worry about the payments an to use the money to fix it cause they couldn't find the problem. So I found the problem but it was to expensive for me so I told them yesterday that I would catch the payments up today an let them fix it. Than they came got it saying I didnt make payments an told me I was a liar on Facebook. They are very bad people.

name: Carlos Garcia
text:
One of the best lots ive ever been to.
Got a good deal on a nice truck. Payments are reasonable. The staff is awsome. Thank you david and kip for being down to earth and honest. Will definitley be buying my next truck from here.

name: john milligan
text: great group of guys:) made my car buying easy !!! nice selection of vehicles and the warentys are a plus!!! was in and out in no time with a realy nice car!! would deffenty deal with again in the future and i highly recomend these guys for your car buying needs.

name: Daniel Johnson
text: Took about 4 weeks longer than expected, Jennifer was a lot of help, installers were great and the end results were great!!!!

name: Will S
text: I have never in my life left a bad review for anywhere but this place is a JOKE! First they tell you 6-8 weeks before your stuff will come in and then when the 8 weeks is up they don't even have the decency to call and let you know it will be longer. I called several times and they always say they will call back and let you know something and NEVER do! Horrible communication skills.

name: Jessie YOUNG
text: The salesperson did not get up from her desk and was not very helpful. The gauge of their buildings is very thin, the rollup doors look like they would be trouble.

name: Rickey Streetman
text: Very friendly sales woman thinking seriously about building a storage building

name: bobby pullin
text:
I bought an RV carport with enclosed lean toons
On each side. Working with Jennifer I was able to get what i wanted at an affordable price. The whole process from buying the building to install was only 9 days.

The installers arrived on time and worked tirelessly for 8 hours to put up the building. They did an outstanding job.

I highly recommend this business!

name: sam heath
text: Bought a carport  from this company ,and they  changed the price 3 times ,dint come out for almost 9 weeks ,and brought the wrong carport,and then wanted 600 more dollars to bring the one i ordered, and then would not even try to make it right,   worst place i ever tryed to do business with,

name: Janet Farley
text: Please read all of this before you buy from these people!  We have been meaning to get the carports done but had a lifestyle change that forced us to do so right away.  Quality was very cooperative and had our carport up in just a couple days.  We had an issue with the carport and that was fixed in a few days.  We had another issue where the trim was coming off after the storms that came thru just a few days later because the installers had not screwed it down properly or with enough screws.  when i called to tell them that it had blown off and did not have but one screw in it the owner preceded to tell me he was not responsible for wind damage.  when I told him it was not wind damage because the same carport was put up in the side yard with over twice as many screws and it was fine that the installer had not properly screwed in the trim he got mad at me and repeated his spill about wind damage.  When i told him we would fix it ourselves and I would leave this review he (Skip) decided to have them come out.  The installer was supposed to be here on 4/17/2020 and guess what...no one showed up; even after him telling me at 2 o clock that they "would be there before the end of the day".  Carport is fixed by us and if you need a carport please get someone else!!!!  We will for the next one we put up.

name: Catharine Biggio
text:
They do not deserve any stars ... rude and unprofessional!! Ordered carport 11/06/19, took them 10 weeks to get it installed. We received ONE call about installation the week of Christmas, we could be home for that one. Installation manager said he would call back and get it scheduled, HE DID NOT!! If I had not called, I would still be waiting.
I called  1/16/20 and told Kip that I wanted my carport, and I wanted it installed Monday 1/20/20 I assured me it would be. On 1/20/20 I called to see what time to be expecting the installer, Kip told me he would have installer call me ... Kip called me back, he had not had the carport loaded... and I would just have to wait.. I then canceled my order. I ask for the manager of owner. Kip claimed to be the owner.. he isn’t!  After all this annoyance I did contact the owner, after numerous calls , research and being spoken down to , which I believe it is because of being female. I ask the owner, Jerry for a discount due to the late installation. He flat out refused and stated that Kip had attempted to call many times... this is a sad excuse for a business, extreme horrible customer service!! My husband and I am are looking at building a rather large metal building and completing a house inside... WE WILL NOT BE USING THIS COMPANY!!

name: Kilby M
text: Horrible business

name: Gerie Biffle
text:
I was dissapointed that my building was not trimmed out like the one on Quality's web site that I was directed to when deciding which building type to choose.   When I confronted them about it they said the J trim was an add on and cost extra.   When I tried to get them to add it, paying the extra $$,  they said they did not do the J trim to get with the installer.   When taking to the installer he didn't know how to do it like pictured.   Going through the described process took weeks and was excruciating.

The work I did receive was not very good quality.   The roof cap was crooked and the edges of the roof were uneven.   Do not use this company!  They are poor communicators, do sloppy work and do not back up their product.

name: Priscilla Isbell
text: They installed my carport one week after I placed my order. Very nice and helpful customer service . Only thing I can complain about was the installers was 2 hrs late. Other than that . Great service !

name: Ted and Angie LeMay
text: Building leaks and can’t get them to fix it. Guy came out to access leak and tore up my trim in the process. Can’t get them to fix that either.

name: Larry Whisenant
text:
I had a problem with scheduling.
Three times, actually I was told 6 or 7 times I was told they would be here to do the install, over three different days. I voiced my displeasure a few times, and they finally showed up, on Memorial Day, to do the install. I am pleased with the results of the finished Product, but the customer service department really should get their act together!

name: Josh Haney
text: I work there..in the reviews the biffle woman wanted a Carolina building  and order an quilty building I have many customer back me on work she just order the wrong building ridge cap wasn't crooked I level ever building I do even on concrete like hers thank u

name: emmanuel martinez
text: The customer service is horrible. If need product such as metal roof, you must place your order for next day. Guys that cuts metal are rude. they say they don't have time but they are always in the office doing nothing. I asked  lady for metal roof. after she run my credit card I was told I needed to come back the next day. I took a few seconds to think about it, then  i asked if it was possible for same-day. I was told take it or leave it in very disrespectful way. go somewhere else.

name: Shera Weston
text: Great place, we ordered a carport from them, delivered the very next day! Friendly employees!!

name: Keith Lilienthal
text: This place is great. The product is unsurpassed.

name: Derrick Odell
text: Quality carports, set up was fast and professional.

name: Filemon Zarate
text: The people there are great and them help you the best them can

name: Marco Antonio Dominguez Gayosso
text: The rudest people I ever talked to, the lady that answered the phone, out of nothing just hanged up the phone on me...

name: Lalo Vital
text: Bad custumer service. Not worth you bussines

name: Joe Duncan
text: The worst company in Alabama.  Biggest bunch of liars you will ever talk to. Do not do business with these people.

name: Ashllie Ramirez
text: Professional caring customer service, Haley made sure I selected the best building to fit my needs. Delivery was quick and easy. The delivery men were very kind and sure to level the building and place it where I wanted. They have such a wide variety to choose from to fit everyone's needs. I was able to customize my building to my liking. Haley was honest and took time to look around with me. I spent nearly 4 hours here trying to make a decision on all their selection. Would recommend to anyone in search of a good quality building and great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you so very much Ashllie!! I do my best to make sure every customer will love their building!! Hope you’re doing well!

name: Becca A. Ali
text: Gorgeous buildings and very good prices, hailey is the absolute best ! 5 stars !!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business and review!! We are so happy you love your buildings!

name: Kristen Smith
text: If you ever get behind in a payment due to an illness or whatever the reason they will make payment arrangements with you to catch it up then after you’ve paid them still come get your building. 10/10 do not recommend if you are looking for someone to trust and honesty  is important to you.

resp.text:
I am very sorry to hear this! Unfortunately, I can't control the financing company policies. I do know that you have so many days after a payment is due to make it up, most of our companies do let you get a few months behind before repossessing the item.
I hate that you are displeased with our business, but there isn't anything I can do about the financing companies, but I do not believe we have ever repossessed anything that was paid for!!

name: Richard Groover
text: Prices are UNBEATABLE!

name: donald TURNER
text: I absolutely love the shed. The quality and appearance of the shed beats all competitors. I have nothing but praise for those 2 points. However,  I do think Tuff shed should add additional staff to better accommodate customers. It took 2 months to get my shed installed after my purchase. Quite simply, I feel that is unacceptable. The installer did a great job overall when the installation was completed but 2 months is too long to wait for an 8’ x 12’ shed.

resp.text: We're glad to hear that you're happy with your new shed, Donald and we do apologize for the delay. As we do have longer than usual lead times currently, we appreciate your patience.

name: Ryan Rebowe
text: Ed and the team at Tuff Shed were great from start to finish. Very professional. Worked very hard to get our shed installed on its designated date despite some road blocks. Installers worked meticulously to make sure all was up to our specifications and what we wanted. Would definitely recommend them.

resp.text: We're glad to hear that, Ryan. Thank you for choosing to work with our team here at Tuff Shed Mobile for your new shed.

name: michael seals
text:
Great, quality product.  Delivery and installation went quite well.  Sales and management included periodic updates during the process.

I would do this again!!

resp.text: We're glad to hear that, Michael. Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review.

name: Ben W.
text: Much better! Long story short is it started off pretty rough but ended well. The original installers did a less than sub-par job with craftsmanship. After sending Tuff Shed photos of the “finished” product, they sent a different team of carpenters back and corrected about 99% of the problems created by the first crew. The management in place there seems to care about repeat business. They made it right, and are standing by their end of the deal. Special thanks to Sarah and Tasha!!!

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review, Ben. Thank you for giving our team an opportunity to make this right. We hope you enjoy putting your shed to good use for years to come.

name: tony dughaishjjijjg
text:
Excellent service on time the manager are very helpful and professional don't go any where else
The installation crew very polite and on time
Over all experience was excellent 👌

resp.text: We're glad to hear that! Thank you for choosing to work with our team at Tuff Shed Mobile.

name: Andrew Sanders
text: Go to the location and see Ed to get your work ordered and done. He will make sure you get exactly what you need for the right price.

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review, Andrew.

name: walter crawford
text:
Ed was extremely helpful, discussed several options and cost.  He explained the warranty and what to expect on the day of installation.

Was originally quoted a  delivery of 60 + days, was surprised when Tuff Shed  called and schedule the installation within 30 days.

resp.text: We were happy to help, Walter and we appreciate you choosing to work with our team at Tuff Shed Mobile. We hope you enjoy your new shed.

name: Patrick Partin
text: Ed was very professional and helpful when helpful when helping me design my shed.

resp.text: We were happy to help, Patrick. Thanks for choosing to work with our team at Tuff Shed Mobile.

name: Alicia Robertson
text: Had an excellent experience! Our sales rep Bobby was extremely knowledgeable of all the options available and navigated the website seamlessly! She did not pressure at all, gave us a quote, and left the decision to us. After purchase, the install was flawless and after several rain storms, there have been NO issues at all! I would highly recommend Tuff Shed if you are looking for a quality storage building with no hassles!

resp.text: We're glad to hear that your new building is working well for you, Alicia. Thanks for taking the time to leave our team a review.

name: John Radford
text: Great food and good location in DFW airport.

name: Matt Yawn
text: Ed Adams has been a pleasure to deal with. I built my shed online and within 24 hrs Ed had called me to answer any questions I had. He has also been very responsive through text/email throughout the build process. Couple more weeks until install but so far I could not ask for a better experience! Thanks Ed

resp.text: We were happy to help every step of the way, Matt. Thank you for choosing to work with our team at Tuff Shed Mobile and for taking the time to leave us a review.

name: Ross Maritime
text: The sale staff "Bobbie H." was exceptional as well as the management "Charlie P." They came out to look at the location to ensure what i wanted would fit and provided me with the best options for my site. The set up was on time and very professional. The building looks great and fit my site perfectly. I Highly recommend Tuff Shed Mobile if your in need of additional storage or usable space.

resp.text: We were happy to help you get set up with a great Tuff Shed building, Ross. We hope you enjoy putting your new shed to good use for years to come.

name: D Jones
text:
Our sales representative, Bobbie Hebert, was extremely knowledgeable and took the time to walk us through the the options available, sizing, and pricing to fit our needs and budget,  She helped us understand the purchasing process and kept everything simple. We appreciated her attention to detail!

Our installer, Chris Crowther, arrived when he was scheduled and worked very hard to get our Tuff Shed built.  He talked with us about positioning and how the Shed would be strapped down. We appreciated Chris' attention to detail and recommendations!

Our Tuff Shed just went through Hurricane Sally as it went through Daphne. It took the wind and rain like a champ. It stayed positioned solid on the pad and dry inside. We took forward to years of happy use.

This is our 2nd Tuff Shed. We purchased a unit while living in Arizona and used it for the 8 years we lived in the house.  It was as solid the day we moved as when it was built, thus supporting our decision to purchase our 2nd Tuff Shed.

Thanks also to Quinten Norphleet for his communications regarding the status and delivery of our Tuff Shed.  We appreciated his attention o detail!

name: Jeff Cabana
text: Bobbie Hebert assisted me with exceptional knowledge and very professional and real time guidance. I was able to purchase my new Tuff Shed with the configuration that i needed. Bobbie is an awesome person that knows her stuff  about the Tuff Shed Products. Thanks for the great and personal support.

resp.text: We were happy to help, Jeff. Thank you for taking the time to leave our team a review, we appreciate it.

name: Judah Banks
text: The best place to buy a shed it made a good man cave Charlie was the best to make it happen for me

name: Wendell Rankin
text: Bobbie Hebert is absolutely awesome. Her professionalism was really on point. I would definitely recommend Tuff Shed. 5 stars

resp.text: We're glad to hear that. Thanks for leaving us a review.

name: April Thrasher
text: Very upset with my purchase of our Tuff Shed since we have never received it, or received a call, email, text or any kind of response from this company about our shed being delivered.  We have called, left messages, sent emails, through the Home Depot where we purchased it and the Tuff Shed company in Mobile to no avail. Terrible customer service!  Do not buy this product, go for a Graceland shed instead, I REALLY WISH WE HAD!!!  Let me repeat, we still haven't even received it or a call about scheduling the delivery!!  Paid over $3000 over 10 days ago!

resp.text: We're sorry to hear about the issues you've experienced with the delivery of your building and our team will do what we can to help make this right. Please email our National Support Team at ccare@tuffshed.com with the name the order was placed under and a good contact number to reach you. Our team will be in touch as soon as possible to help.

name: Nicolas Orleans
text: When you go, ask for Bobbie Hebert. She was amazing. Knowledgeable about all products, patient and took time to make sure we got exactly what we wanted.

resp.text: Thanks for talking the time to leave us a review, Nicolas. We appreciate it.

name: Randy Dorman
text: Bobbie was so helpful and very personable. She made the purchasing process very easy. Her knowledge and professionalism are beyond reproach.

resp.text: We're glad to hear that, Randy. Thanks for taking the time to leave our team a review.

name: T F
text: We had shed installed on 4/2/20. It was not installed correctly, and the installation was not complete. We have been trying to get someone to come back out to fix the issue since that day and we are not getting  a response. And they want to send us a document to esign to say installation is complete. We aren't signing anything until someone comes to fix the installation and actually complete it. Very unprofessional and we are not happy with this company. The sales rep in our area is the only one who will respond or offer any help, but he can't complete the installation. We understand that things may be delayed during this time, but at least contact us and give us a date/time someone will come out. We have an empty shed that is doing us no good.

resp.text: We're sorry to hear that and we apologize for the delay in reply. We want to be certain that you're happy with the finished building and our service. If you do have any further concerns, please do email our team at ccare@tuffshed.com with the details and a good contact number to reach you. Our team will do what we can to help.

name: Leah Stephens
text: Amazing employees that get the job done and get the job done right!! Very courteous guys that work in shop. The ladies up front are kind and knowledgeable about the sheds and the options.

name: wolf pressburger
text: Shed is great! Warranty service is non existent. 😣

resp.text: We're sorry to hear that and our team will do what we can to help. Please email our National Support Team at ccare@tuffshed.com with the details of the issue, the name the order was placed under, and a good contact number to reach you. Our team will be in touch as soon as possible to help.

name: Steve
text: Bobbie was great to work with and very helpful in completing my order.

resp.text: We were happy to help, Steve. Thanks for taking the time to leave our team a review.

name: Tina Lacoste
text: Awesome place to look when your considering a tiy house project.

resp.text: Thanks for leaving us a review, Tina. We appreciate it.

name: Larry Miller
text: Makes space easy

name: Roy Hollie
text: Excellent customer service from salesman Eddie Hinote who assisted with me selecting the perfect building for my needs.  Installation crew was professional and arrived on time.  I could not have had a better experience with the whole process.

name: Helan Coleman
text: Good customer service impresses us all but exceptional customer service is worth sharing with others so I felt compelled to share that Eddie with Tuff Shed went way far and beyond to work with me on my project which consisted of several challenges and I was beyond impressed by his professionalism and personal attention given to my situation. If you are buying a shed he’s the guy!

name: Carolyn Stewart
text: The build on site experience is best missed along with a custom build. Lots of promises, smiling faces and very little follow through. Six weeks in and still no roof, windows or doors. Rain has been an issue for sure but working for three to five hours once a week is unacceptable.

name: Carol Hancock
text: Sales man was very nice and informative. Delivery was quick and very professional. I love my shef.

name: Chris Stanley
text: Over priced. DIY bigger, better, cheaper.

resp.text: We're sorry to hear that, Chris. We work hard to ensure the price of our buildings accurately reflect the product quality, service, and warranty included.

name: Joni Euler
text: If you are looking for an outdoor building, Tuff Shed is the answer. Eddie Hinote did an outstanding job of bringing my vision of a "she shed" to a finished product. After a 2-day build, the professional construction crew departed with no evidence that a construction project had even taken place. Tuff Shed provides many choices of buildings, windows, doors, colors, etc. and the customer can design the building to fit their needs-unlike pre-fab buildings. Thanks to Tuff Shed-Mobile for my perfect  crafting workshop.

name: Allan Kerley
text: They  need  to  work  on  their  customer  service.

resp.text: We're sorry to hear that, Allan and we'd like to learn more about your experience so we can better improve our service in the future. Please email our National Support Team at ccare@tuffshed.com with the details and a good contact number to reach you. Our team will do what we can to help.

name: Lisa B. Howard
text: Eddie at Tuff Shed was wonderful to work with in all aspects from the beginning to the end of my shed experience.

name: Colby Jackson
text: Eddie knows his stuff. Enjoyed working with him!

name: Bob Kelly
text: Very overpriced buildings. Did not get a good vibe about this place. I shopped elsewhere and got a great deal on a very well built building, and it was delivered in 2 days!

resp.text: Hi Bob, we're sorry to hear that our first impression wasn't our best. Congratulations on finding the right building for your needs and if you're ever in the market for another building in future, we hope you'll give us a second chance.

name: Ashton Jackson
text: Go see Eddie for your shed needs! He will NOT disappoint!

name: Jill Clair Gentry
text: Absolutely horrible experience. Salesman doesn't know what he is doing and permitting is a nightmare. Overpromised, underdelivered the entire way. Do NOT use Tuff Shed.

name: Thomas Moynihan
text: Not much available on display outside, but overall good space and availability of products.

name: Milton Turney
text: Good product

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review!

name: Lucas Bedia
text: Eddie really knows his sheds.

name: Brandon Buxton
text: I am very pleased with my new shed install and the overall experience with Tuff Shed. Ed with Tuff Shed was very helpful with the whole process. Only one small hiccup which was quickly resolved.

resp.text: We were happy to help, Brandon and we appreciate you choosing to work with our team at Tuff Shed Mobile.

name: Arizona Pastorcich
text: This place is wonderful! So friendly and super quick. If I need any other buildings that's where I'll go!

name: Dr.David Callaway
text: The best prices, and Quality building's The staff were really nice. Great customer service.

name: della gray
text: The girl that works there is such an AWESOME person I love her. JDMB 😁

name: Mac1776
text: Excellent folks to work with.

name: Kaylene Prather
text: Helpful and informational staff,made me want more info on barndominiums.
